TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event profiles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改`profiles`元素`healthMonitoring`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `profiles` element of the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file. 事件的設定檔會決定如何收集 asp.net 並對提供者引發事件。Event profiles determine how events are collected by ASP.NET and raised to providers. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值`profiles`區段，也可以做為成員的存取類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `profiles` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何以宣告方式指定的數個屬性的值`profiles`> 一節。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the `profiles` section. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別參考不正確，如下所示 （括號中的項目不是必要）：*命名空間*。*Typename*， *Assemblyname*[、] [版本 = x] [文化特性 = y] [PublicKeyToken = z]。The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]. 比方說，"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType，Example.Assembly，版本 = %assembly_version%，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = %microsoft_publickey%"For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%" ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#66](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#66)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#66](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#66)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

value.span: 引發事件相同類型的最大次數。

span.span: The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 值可無限期設定為。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 此屬性指定時間將會引發相同類型的事件的數目上限。This property specifies the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised. 例如，如果值為`10`，事件將引發 10 次，並忽略之後。For example if the value is `10`, the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#63](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#63)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#63)]

member this.MinInstances : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of event occurrences before the event is raised to the provider.

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of event occurrences before the event is raised to the provider.

value.span: 提供者引發事件之前的事件項目最小數目。

span.span: The minimum number of event occurrences before the event is fired to the provider.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 值可無限期設定為。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 此屬性會指定事件發生之前就會引發事件給提供者最少次數。This property specifies the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider. 例如，值為`5`表示，ASP.NET 將不會引發事件給提供者，直到發生事件的第五個執行個體。For example, a value of `5` means that ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs. 如果值為無限 ()，則會不引發任何事件，提供者。If the value is infinite (), then no event will be raised to the provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#64](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#64)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#64)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the minimum interval between two events of the same type.

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum interval between two events of the same type.

value.span: A指定相同類型的兩個事件之間的間隔下限。

span.span: A that specifies the minimum interval between two events of the same type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可無限期設定為。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 無效的值可能會造成例外狀況，當儲存的組態區段。Invalid values may cause an exception when the configuration section is saved. 如果值為，則沒有最小的間隔。If the value is , then there is no minimum interval. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要唯一的名稱。A unique name is required. 儲存組態區段時，重複的名稱可能會導致資料遺失。Duplicate names may result in a loss of data when the configuration section is saved. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
